com.escape.games.service
Class ContextResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.service.ContextResourceLoader
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceLoader
public class ContextResourceLoader
extends java.lang.Object
implements ResourceLoader

Default implementation for resource loader. Holds weak references to Android components.

Author:
escape-llc

Map string key to Android resource ID.

Parameters:
key - String key.
Returns:
-1: no key; else: resource ID.

registerShader

public void registerShader(java.lang.String key,
                           java.lang.String vsource,
                           java.lang.String fsource)
Register a custom shader. Obtains update lock. Shader is not compiled/linked until it is called for (if at all). Should call before this instance is installed.

Parameters:
key - Shader key.
vsource - Vertex shader source.
fsource - Fragment shader source.

createShader

public com.escape.games.resource.Shader createShader(java.lang.String key)
Return a cached shader program or NULL if failed. On cache miss dispatch GL operation to create resource. Holds update lock until complete. Synchronizes with GL thread.

Specified by:
createShader in interface ResourceLoader
Parameters:
key - Shader program name, e.g. "basic".
Returns:
Cached program.

internalCreateShaders

protected boolean internalCreateShaders(android.content.Context ctx,
                                        android.opengl.GLSurfaceView sv,
                                        com.escape.games.resource.Shader[] shs,
                                        java.lang.String... keys)
Common create shaders in batch. Adds shaders to the cache no overwrite. Synchronizes with GL thread (via Shader.create).

Parameters:
ctx - Source of services. Must be non-NULL.
sv - Dispatch to GL thread. Must be non-NULL.
shs - Target list of created shaders.
keys - Source list of keys.
Returns:
true: invoked on GL; false: not.

internalCreateTextures

protected boolean internalCreateTextures(android.content.Context ctx,
                                         android.opengl.GLSurfaceView sv,
                                         com.escape.games.resource.Texture[] output,
                                         java.lang.String... keys)

preloadShaders

public void preloadShaders(java.lang.String... keys)
Preload the list of shaders. If key is already cached, it is overwritten. Subsequent call to createShader() returns instance loaded here. Synchronizes with GL thread. Entire list runs under update lock.

Specified by:
preloadShaders in interface ResourceLoader
Parameters:
keys - list of shader keys.

createTexture

public com.escape.games.resource.Texture createTexture(java.lang.String key)
Return a cached texture or NULL if failed. On cache miss dispatch GL operation to create resource. Holds update lock until complete. Synchronizes with GL thread.

Specified by:
createTexture in interface ResourceLoader
Parameters:
key - texture key.
Returns:
Cached texture.

preloadTextures

public void preloadTextures(java.lang.String... keys)
Preload the list of textures. If key is already cached, it is skipped. Entire list runs under update lock.

Specified by:
preloadTextures in interface ResourceLoader
Parameters:
keys - list of texture keys.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - no resource found for key

createBuffer

public com.escape.games.resource.VertexBufferObject createBuffer(Geometry geom)
Create the VBO. Synchronizes with GL thread.

Specified by:
createBuffer in interface ResourceLoader
Parameters:
geom - Source geometry.
Returns:
New VBO.

readRawResource

public static java.lang.String readRawResource(android.content.Context context,
                                               int resourceId)
Pump the stream into a string.

Parameters:
context - Source of resources.
resourceId - Resource stream ID.
Returns:
Contents or Empty String.

reload

public void reload()
Dispatch operation to GL to reload cached resources. Holds update lock until complete. Synchronizes with GL thread. Do not call from GL thread!

Specified by:
reload in interface ResourceLoader
